troubleshooting_steps.title: Check Same WiFi Network
troubleshooting_steps.description: Ensure phone and computer are on same WiFi network
troubleshooting_steps.test: Phone should be on same network as computer (192.168.29.xxx)

troubleshooting_steps.title: Test Direct URL
troubleshooting_steps.description: Open mobile browser and type URL manually

troubleshooting_steps.title: Test from Computer
troubleshooting_steps.description: Verify server works from same machine
